body_html:
Moved to tf.contrib. As soon as I can I'll improve the doc (sorry but I'm doing this in the spare time after work).
I've written no unit testing, I just tested it on MackeyGlass dataset. I'm not sure about how to write effective unit testing since it's mostly based on randomness, however if it's needed I can try to write something.
